item.title: Peculiar
item.description:
Peculiar
Such is life
an overdrive.
Reverse surface
hangin’ on the interface.
What you make; makes you off.
Known oblivion
returns and bluffs.
Trying to decipher, but mind,
just s-w-i-t-c-h-e-s off.
Sit with your arms designed
let silence speak for the non resign.
Forbidden traps of seclusion
You never align to conclusion.
Monotone, jigsaw cones.
So is an unlikely twiddle.
Here with everything you fiddle,
thy symphony lives a riddle
likewise in rounds you doodle.
Perhaps you too, wish to be
an eagle; in blue
Or a kingfisher true
rightly better than bleeding with no clue
Unforseen realisation………….
Checked, crooked.
You are just a passerby,
in every other sky.
And such is life
An overdrive.
Gotta go for a drive.
A shore free and clear
Hell no, not interested in beer!

~AB

item.title: Submit
item.description:
Your work will be published with great pride!

In light of the time and effort we have invested Eunoia and also the costs in keeping the site up, we have decided to charge on a pay what you want model with a minimum cap of ₹9 (As an act of goodwill, you can pay few rupees more if you wish ☺️)

Here are the steps to submit your work and get it published on Eunoia:

  1. You can pay us through upi at https://upier.vercel.app/pay/9957202935@fam?am=9
  2. Send us an email on eunoia01@pm.me with a typed copy of your work (if it’s a poem or any form of writing) or images (for art) and fee receipt as an attachment.
  3. Voila! Your work will be published as soon as possible ✨
